text: I do use notes, the issue is not separating the orders internally, I can do that. The issue is when calling the `trading.betting.list_cleared_orders` endpoint, it is only possible to separate orders by the customer_strategy_ref value. When running 2 strategies in the same flumine instance it's not possible to give different values to each strategy unfortunately. I'd like to "mark" the orders in Betfair's side so that later when analyzing results by calling the API in 1 month I can separate the orders and attribute the P&L to each Strategy.
